pages.text: Wildfires are a new variant of Blazes. They can be found in the Nether Fortresses and randomly over the Nether. They have more health, more armor and deals more damage too.$(br2)They can put up shields to become invulnerable for a short period of time.$(br2)On death they may drop a $(l:patchouli:armors/outvoted/wildfire_helmet)Wildfire Helmet$(/l) or a Shattered Blaze Piece.
You can use this last one to craft a Wildfire Shield Part, then, you can use this to make a WIldfire Shield in an Anvil.
